授業目的: This course examines current cases of conflict between secular society and religion in liberal democracies around the world. Through this course, students are encouraged to reflect critically on the meaning of such key concepts as religious freedom, secularism, and multiculturalism.
到達目標: By taking this course, students will gain knowledge of contemporary China as well as skills in the comparative analysis of social and culture issues.
特記事項: 本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法: Weekly postings, student presentations, class discussion, mini lectures

第1回: Explanation of syllabus and introductory remarks. Classes will be conducted face-to-face from the 1st week.
